original_text:
In a multitude of people is the glory of a king,
    but without people a prince is ruined.
korean_text: 백성이 많은 것은 왕의 영광이요 백성이 적은 것은 주권자의 패망이니라

sentences.original_text: In a multitude of people is the glory of a king
sentences.korean_translation: 백성이 많은 데에 왕의 영광이 있다

sentences.original_text: but without people a prince is ruined.
